EDUCATION
IN THE GOREBRIDGE AREA THERE ARE TWO PRIMARY SCHOOLS AND ONE NURSERY SCHOOL. THE TWO PRIMARIES ARE GOREBRIDGE WITH A ROLL OF 358 AND STAFF OF 15 TEACHERS AND STOBHILL WITH A ROLL OF 99 AND 5 TEACHERS.A NURSERY IS ATTACHED TO GOREBRIDGE WHERE CHILDREN FROM 3 TO 5 YEARS ARE GIVEN THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN AND SOCIALISE WITH OTHER YOUNGSTERS.IT IS ORGANISED ON A TWO SHIFT SYSTEM WITH 40 ATTENDING IN THE MORNING AND A SIMILAR NUMBER IN THE AFTERNOON.IN THE PRIMARY SCHOOLS THE CURRICULUM CONSISTS OF LANGUAGE ARTS ENVIRONMENTAL STUDIES MATHS EXPRESSIVE ARTS RELIGIOUS EDUCATION AND RECREATIVE ACTIVITIES. THE PUPILS DAY LASTS FROM 9AM UNTIL 3PM WITH A BREAK OF 1HOUR FOR LUNCH.
